nodes.text: The Cyclor Shipyards was a set of vast shipyards that orbited the Mid Rim planet Cyclor, homeworld of the Cyclorrian species. The Cyclorrians maintained the shipyards, which constructed starships such as the Galactic Republic's Z-29 Skyhawk. The starship Innovator, designed by the engineer Vam Targes, was also constructed at the shipyards during the High Republic Era. A Nihil marauder force attacked the Cyclor Shipyards in an attempt to destroy the Innovator prior to the Republic Fair.
